statusLine.command: input=$(cat); [ -n "$SSH_CONNECTION" ] && printf '\033[33m%s ' "$(hostname -s)"; printf '\033[34m%s ' "$(pwd | sed "s|^$HOME|~|" | awk '{if (length($0) > 20) print "..." substr($0, length($0)-16); else print $0}')"; model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name // empty'); [ -n "$model" ] && printf '\033[36m%s ' "$model"; printf '\033[0m'
